actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the restriction that a clinical psychologist or a clinical social worker provide services in a comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility to a patient only under the care of a physician.
short_title: Autonomy for Psychologists and Social Workers Act of 2005

summary.text: Autonomy for Psychologists and Social Workers Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to remove the restriction that a clinical psychologist or clinical social worker provide services to a patient in a comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility only under the care of a physician.

titles.title: Autonomy for Psychologists and Social Workers Act of 2005

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the restriction that a clinical psychologist or a clinical social worker provide services in a comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility to a patient only under the care of a physician.
